Travel

Boston's Irish Heritage Trail

Explore more than 300 years of Irish-American history in Boston by following the Irish Heritage Trail. The tour consists of 20 stops along 3 miles, featuring many important historical events in the lives of those of Irish descent in the city and its surrounding area.
